languages.text: Проходит две корабельные вахты прежде, чем ксеносы решаются ответить на уговоры Ирлиэт принять помощь элантах. Сдержано интересуясь, как именно мон-кай могут помочь их судну, эльдары отмечают, что примитивные технологии людей не способны залечить раны эльдарского корабля. Как не способна внезапная благосклонность одного человека вернуть тех, кто погиб в недавнем побоище.

Two watches pass, and the xenos finally decide to answer Yrliet's pleas concerning the elantach's assistance. Guardedly asking how exactly the mon-keigh can help their vessel, the Aeldari note that the humans' primitive technologies are incapable of healing the Aeldari vessel's wounds. The sudden benevolence of one human is equally incapable of bringing back those who perished in the recent engagement.
languages.original_text: Проходит две корабельные вахты прежде, чем ксеносы решаются ответить на уговоры Ирлиэт принять помощь элантах. Сдержано интересуясь, как именно мон-кай могут помочь их судну, эльдары отмечают, что примитивные технологии людей не способны залечить раны эльдарского корабля. Как не способна внезапная благосклонность одного человека вернуть тех, кто погиб в недавнем побоище.

Guardedly asking how exactly can the mon-keigh help their vessel, the Aeldari mark that the humans' primitive technologies are incapable of healing the Aeldari vessel's wounds. The sudden benevolence of one human is equally incapable of bringing back those who perished in the recent engagement.

Guardedly asking how exactly the mon-keigh can help their vessel, the Aeldari note that the humans' primitive technologies are incapable of healing the Aeldari vessel's wounds. Two watches pass, and the xenos finally decide to answer Yrliet's pleas concerning the elantach's assistance. Guardedly asking how exactly the mon-keigh can help their vessel, the Aeldari note that the humans' primitive technologies are incapable of healing the Aeldari vessel's wounds. The sudden benevolence of one human is equally incapable of bringing back those who perished in the recent engagement.

languages.text: 伊莉耶特向她的族人建议，让外界人协助他们。过了两巡之后，这些艾达灵族才决定答复伊莉耶特的提议。他们小心翼翼地询问猴子打算如何修复他们的飞船。他们指出，人类的原始技术无法修复艾达灵族飞船的伤口，某人的突然仁慈也无法复活那些在最近战斗中不幸丧生的人。
languages.original_text: Two watches pass, and the xenos finally decide to answer Yrliet's pleas concerning the elantach's assistance. Guardedly asking how exactly the mon-keigh can help their vessel, the Aeldari note that the humans' primitive technologies are incapable of healing the Aeldari vessel's wounds. The sudden benevolence of one human is equally incapable of bringing back those who perished in the recent engagement.

traits.locale_text: 伊莉耶特向她的族人建议，让外界人协助他们。过了两巡之后，这些艾达灵族才决定答复伊莉耶特的提议。他们小心翼翼地询问猴子打算如何修复他们的飞船。他们指出，人类的原始技术无法修复艾达灵族飞船的伤口，某人的突然仁慈也无法复活那些在最近战斗中不幸丧生的人。

languages.text: 2時間が経過し、異種族はついにエランタの援助に関するユリエットの嘆願に応えることにした。モン＝ケイが彼らの船のために何ができるか用心深く尋ねると、アエルダリは人間の原始的な技術ではアエルダリの船を修理することはできないと言った。ひとりの人間が突然善意を表したからといって、先日の交戦で命を落とした者たちを生き返らせることなどできないのと同じである。
languages.original_text: Two watches pass, and the xenos finally decide to answer Yrliet's pleas concerning the elantach's assistance. Guardedly asking how exactly the mon-keigh can help their vessel, the Aeldari note that the humans' primitive technologies are incapable of healing the Aeldari vessel's wounds. The sudden benevolence of one human is equally incapable of bringing back those who perished in the recent engagement.

traits.locale_text: 2時間が経過し、異種族はついにエランタの援助に関するユリエットの嘆願に応えることにした。モン＝ケイが彼らの船のために何ができるか用心深く尋ねると、アエルダリは人間の原始的な技術ではアエルダリの船を修理することはできないと言った。ひとりの人間が突然善意を表したからといって、先日の交戦で命を落とした者たちを生き返らせることなどできないのと同じである。

languages.text: Pasan dos guardias y los xenos deciden finalmente responder a las súplicas de Yrliet sobre la ayuda de{mf|l| la} elantach. Preguntando con cautela cómo pueden exactamente los mon-keigh ayudar a su nave, los Aeldari señalan que las tecnologías primitivas de los humanos son incapaces de reparar los daños de la nave Aeldari. La repentina benevolencia de un humano es igualmente incapaz de traer de vuelta a los que perecieron en el último enfrentamiento.
languages.original_text: Two watches pass, and the xenos finally decide to answer Yrliet's pleas concerning the elantach's assistance. Guardedly asking how exactly the mon-keigh can help their vessel, the Aeldari note that the humans' primitive technologies are incapable of healing the Aeldari vessel's wounds. The sudden benevolence of one human is equally incapable of bringing back those who perished in the recent engagement.

traits.locale_text: Pasan dos guardias y los xenos deciden finalmente responder a las súplicas de Yrliet sobre la ayuda de{mf|l| la} elantach. Preguntando con cautela cómo pueden exactamente los mon-keigh ayudar a su nave, los Aeldari señalan que las tecnologías primitivas de los humanos son incapaces de reparar los daños de la nave Aeldari. La repentina benevolencia de un humano es igualmente incapaz de traer de vuelta a los que perecieron en el último enfrentamiento.{g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}{/g}

languages.text: Zwei Wachschichten verstreichen, ehe die Xenos endlich auf Yrliets Bitten reagieren, sich von dem Elantach helfen zu lassen. Die Aeldari fragen vorsichtig an, wie die Chem-Pan-Sey ihrem Schiff helfen könnten. Die primitiven Technologien der Menschen seien ja nicht in der Lage, die Wunden des Aeldari-Schiffs zu heilen. Das plötzliche Wohlwollen eines einzelnen Menschen kann die Toten aus der letzten Schlacht nicht wieder lebendig machen.
languages.original_text: Two watches pass, and the xenos finally decide to answer Yrliet's pleas concerning the elantach's assistance. Guardedly asking how exactly the mon-keigh can help their vessel, the Aeldari note that the humans' primitive technologies are incapable of healing the Aeldari vessel's wounds. The sudden benevolence of one human is equally incapable of bringing back those who perished in the recent engagement.

traits.locale_text: Zwei Wachschichten verstreichen, ehe die Xenos endlich auf Yrliets Bitten reagieren, sich von dem Elantach helfen zu lassen. Die Aeldari fragen vorsichtig an, wie die Chem-Pan-Sey ihrem Schiff helfen könnten. Die primitiven Technologien der Menschen seien ja nicht in der Lage, die Wunden des Aeldari-Schiffs zu heilen. Das plötzliche Wohlwollen eines einzelnen Menschen kann die Toten aus der letzten Schlacht nicht wieder lebendig machen.

languages.text: Deux quarts s'écoulent avant que les xénos se décident à répondre à l'offre d'assistance d'Yrliet. Méfiants, ils se demandent en quoi les mon-keigh pourraient bien les aider, arguant que la technologie primitive des humains serait bien incapable de réparer les avaries dont souffre leur vaisseau, de même que la bienveillance soudaine d'un individu isolé ne leur rendra pas leurs camarades morts au cours de l'échauffourée.
languages.original_text: Two watches pass, and the xenos finally decide to answer Yrliet's pleas concerning the elantach's assistance. Guardedly asking how exactly the mon-keigh can help their vessel, the Aeldari note that the humans' primitive technologies are incapable of healing the Aeldari vessel's wounds. The sudden benevolence of one human is equally incapable of bringing back those who perished in the recent engagement.

traits.locale_text: Deux quarts s'écoulent avant que les xénos se décident à répondre à l'offre d'assistance d'Yrliet. Méfiants, ils se demandent en quoi les mon-keigh pourraient bien les aider, arguant que la technologie primitive des humains serait bien incapable de réparer les avaries dont souffre leur vaisseau, de même que la bienveillance soudaine d'un individu isolé ne leur rendra pas leurs camarades morts au cours de l'échauffourée.

languages.text: İki nöbet geçiyor ve zenolar sonunda Yrliet'in elantach'ın yardımıyla ilgili yakarışlarına yanıt vermeye karar veriyor. Temkinle mon-keighlerin gemilerine tam olarak nasıl yardım edebileceğini soruyorlar. Aeldariler, insanların ilkel teknolojilerinin Aeldari gemisinin yaralarını iyileştiremeyeceğini belirtiyor. Bir insanın ani iyilikseverliği, son çatışmada ölenleri geri getirmeye de yetmez.
languages.original_text: Two watches pass, and the xenos finally decide to answer Yrliet's pleas concerning the elantach's assistance. Guardedly asking how exactly the mon-keigh can help their vessel, the Aeldari note that the humans' primitive technologies are incapable of healing the Aeldari vessel's wounds. The sudden benevolence of one human is equally incapable of bringing back those who perished in the recent engagement.
